item.description:
One of the oldest and most prestigious sporting events in North America, Providenceâ€™s Bay Colony Cluster Dog Show brings a 100-year tradition to the Rhode Island Convention Center this December. The Bay Colony Dog Show is a four-day show, with each day is hosted by three prestigious New England American Kennel Club (AKC) organizations. 150 AKC breeds are represented at the event.

This event involves a lot of standing and walking around, so comfortable shoes are recommended.

The event also features dog demonstrations, shopping and more. For complete info, please visit http://www.baycolonyd...

Tickets are $12. The website currently has coupons for $1 off which can be printed out. Each member is responsible for their own ticket purchase at the event.

Providence has lots of great restaurants and coffee shops, so let's plan on getting a bite to eat afterwards.

Don't miss this fun event!

We will meet by the ticket purchasing area. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) at ticket entr. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: We're Going to the Dogs! Bay Colony Dog Show, Providence
